Initializer# init(_:in:)

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 8.0+

```
init?<R, S>(
    _ region: R,
    in string: S
) where R : RangeExpression, S : StringProtocol, R.Bound == AttributedString.Index
```

Available when `Bound` is `String.Index`.
